component.name: LightkeeperRM
component.summary: A standalone, customizable server management tool

description.p: LightkeeperRM is a standalone, customizable, modular, server management tool. This is still an early release. There will be some bugs and features missing. See project website for more information.

ul.li: Important fix for theme and colors. Now enforces dark theme.
Add first version of the internal text editor
Important fixes and improvements to GUI on different systems
Some groundwork for seamless app reloads
Fixes and improvements to log view and more modules for reading logs
Fixes and improvements to file editing
Breaking change: changes to configuration schema. Old configuration is not compatible and will be moved aside with .bak suffix.
Implements dialogs for configuring hosts and config groups
Extends module metadata to provide more information for config dialogs
